metadata.title: CVE-2022-1854 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 102.0.5005.61 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
